isRendered

public boolean isRendered(boolean considerVisible)
Check if component is rendered. Consider "rendered" attribute and optionally depend on parameter consider "visible" attribute.

Parameters:
considerVisible - consider "visible" attribute
Returns:
attribute "rendered" value
